titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide transition relief for nonprofit student loan funding corporations.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1732)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the transfer of the assets and liabilities of a tax-exempt scholarship funding corporation in its conversion to a taxable corporation.
